Content.Text:
<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, good morning. I'm coming in!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Have you got some time?
<PAGE>
I was just about to head out to the top
of the mountain for a picnic. Would you
like to come with me?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great! Let's go!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! It sure does feel good this high
up, doesn't it!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're almost at the summit.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>? Are you worn out? Do
you need to take a break?
We're so close, I'm okay!
I need... need a break

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's press on, then. Just a little more
and we'll be there, <MYNAME>! It'll be
worth it.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
We made it! Great work, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I made lunch for us. Do you want to eat
it together, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey, that's not a very nice reaction!
I live alone, so I cook! I cook pretty
well!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I've got confidence in today's spread,
too. Come on, let's eat!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well? Tastes pretty good, doesn't it?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I knew you'd like it! I'd make a
pretty good homemaker, don't you think?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I think having a boyfriend like me would
really help you out, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, did I just say that out loud? I'm
just talking to myself, don't worry!
<PAGE>
I had fun today, <MYNAME>. Let's go out
again soon!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay. Let's take a break by the river
here. It's just as nice there as up top.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Wake up! It's almost
evening.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. How are you feeling?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>You were sleeping so peacefully, I just
couldn't bring myself to wake you up.
Are you okay?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's late, so let's get on home. We can
have a picnic another time.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, don't worry about it! I took a walk
around while you sleeping. Let's just
head for home, okay?

I'm so tired, I fell asleep! Where's Rod
gone off to?

I'm feeling tired. Maybe just take a
quick 5 minute nap...
